description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。现任台北市议会议员、流浪动物之家基金会董事长，曾任国中教师及篮球运动员。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the Kuomintang. He is currently a member of the Taipei City Council and chairman of the Stray Animals Home Foundation. He was formerly a junior high school teacher and a basketball player.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高立法机关台北市议会的成员。
description.en: Members of the Taipei City Council, the highest legislative body in Taipei, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北县（今新北市）的立法机关台北县议会的成员。
description.en: Members of the Taipei County Council, the legislative body of Taipei County (now New Taipei City), Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党，现为台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: The founding political party of the Republic of China, and currently one of the main political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个政党，由中国国民党内的非主流派人士于1993年分出成立。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan, founded in 1993 by a non-mainstream faction that split from the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党副主席，前中华民国副总统连战之子。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang, and son of former Vice President of the Republic of China Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统、行政院院长，前中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as Vice President of the Republic of China, Premier of the Republic of China, and former Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台北市民政局长，现任中国国民党台北市党部主委。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, former Director of the Taipei City Department of Civil Affairs, and current Chairperson of the Kuomintang's Taipei City chapter.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former member of the Legislative Yuan.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党负责党员纪律的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for party discipline within the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 由柯文哲于2019年创立的台湾政党。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan founded by Ko Wen-je in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党于2021年发起的一项旨在团结党员、吸引失联党员回归的计划。
description.en: A program launched by the Kuomintang in 2021 aimed at uniting party members and encouraging the return of disconnected members.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, a member of the Democratic Progressive Party, and a current member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、医师，台湾民众党创党主席，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, founding chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, and former Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台北市副市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Deputy Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 指台北市京华城购物中心原址改建案，因容积率变更引发的图利争议及司法调查案件。
description.en: Refers to the redevelopment case of the former Core Pacific City shopping center site in Taipei, which sparked controversy and judicial investigation over changes in the floor area ratio, leading to allegations of illicit gains.

en: Supreme Court of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、学者，曾任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and scholar, and a former member of the Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，现任监察院院长，曾任高雄市市长、中华民国总统府秘书长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, current President of the Control Yuan, and former Mayor of Kaohsiung and Secretary-General to the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党副主席，前中华民国副总统连战之子。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang, and son of former Vice President of the Republic of China Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、摇滚歌手，曾任立法委员。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and rock singer, and a former member of the Legislative Yuan.

nodes.id: 2022年台北市第五选举区立法委员林昶佐罢免案

zh-cn: 2022年台北市第五选举区立法委员林昶佐罢免案

description.zh-cn: 针对时任立法委员林昶佐的罢免投票案，最终因投票率未达门槛而宣告失败。
description.en: A recall election held against then-Legislator Freddy Lim, which ultimately failed to pass due to insufficient voter turnout.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平曾于1998-2002年担任第8届台北市议员，并自2010年起连任第11至14届台北市议员。
description.en: Chung Hsiao-ping served as a member of the 8th Taipei City Council from 1998 to 2002, and has been re-elected to the 11th through 14th councils since 2010.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平担任第13届台北县议员。
description.en: Chung Hsiao-ping served as a member of the 13th Taipei County Council.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平于2002年加入国民党，2019年退党，后于2022年通过“同舟计划”重返国民党。
description.en: Chung Hsiao-ping joined the Kuomintang in 2002, left the party in 2019, and returned in 2022 through the 'Tongzhou Project'.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平于1993年加入新党，并代表其首次当选公职。
description.en: Chung Hsiao-ping joined the New Party in 1993 and was first elected to public office as its representative.

degree.zh-cn: 政治学研究所在职专班硕士
degree.en: Master's degree from the in-service program of the Graduate Institute of Political Science

description.zh-cn: 2023年9月，国民党提名钟小平参选台北市第五选举区立法委员。
description.en: In September 2023, the Kuomintang nominated Chung Hsiao-ping to run for legislator in Taipei City's 5th electoral district.

description.zh-cn: 在2014年中国国民党台北市长初选中，连胜文击败钟小平等对手获得提名。
description.en: In the 2014 Kuomintang primary for Taipei Mayor, Sean Lien defeated opponents including Chung Hsiao-ping to win the nomination.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平在2016年宣布参选国民党主席时，表示若当选将立即开除连战的党籍。
description.en: When Chung Hsiao-ping announced his candidacy for KMT chairman in 2016, he stated that if elected, he would immediately expel Lien Chan from the party.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年国民党台北市党部主委选举中，黄吕锦茹击败钟小平当选。
description.en: In the 2017 election for the chairperson of the KMT's Taipei City chapter, Huang Lu Chin-ju defeated Chung Hsiao-ping.

description.zh-cn: 在2019年国民党立法委员党内初选中，林郁方击败钟小平。
description.en: In the 2019 KMT legislative primary, Lin Yu-fang defeated Chung Hsiao-ping.

relationships.source: 中国国民党中央委员会考核纪律委员会

description.zh-cn: 因立委初选登记时的纠纷，将钟小平的党权暂停6个月。
description.en: Suspended Chung Hsiao-ping's party rights for 6 months due to a dispute during the legislative primary registration.

description.zh-cn: 2019年退出国民党后，曾宣布以无党籍身份参选立委，并寻求与台湾民众党合作。
description.en: After leaving the Kuomintang in 2019, he announced his intention to run for legislator as an independent and sought cooperation with the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 钟小平通过中国国民党发起的“同舟计划”重返该党。
description.en: Chung Hsiao-ping returned to the Kuomintang through the 'Tongzhou Project' initiated by the party.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年中华民国立法委员选举中，民主进步党候选人吴沛忆击败钟小平当选。
description.en: In the 2024 Republic of China legislative election, Democratic Progressive Party candidate Wu Pei-yi defeated Chung Hsiao-ping.

description.zh-cn: 就京华城案向台北地检署告发时任台北市长柯文哲涉嫌图利，后续引发柯文哲提出诽谤自诉，双方于2025年8月5日和解。
description.en: Accused then-Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je of illicitly benefiting from the Core Pacific City case by filing a complaint with the Taipei District Prosecutors Office, which later led to a defamation lawsuit by Ko. The two parties reached a settlement on August 5, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 因钟小平就京华城案的指控，对钟小平提出诽谤自诉，双方后于2025年8月5日达成和解。
description.en: Filed a private prosecution for defamation against Chung Hsiao-ping over his accusations in the Core Pacific City case; the two parties later reached a settlement on August 5, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 就京华城案向台北地检署一并告发时任台北市副市长彭振声涉嫌图利。
description.en: Also accused then-Taipei Deputy Mayor Peng Chen-sheng of illicitly benefiting from the Core Pacific City case in a complaint filed with the Taipei District Prosecutors Office.

description.zh-cn: 向台北地检署按铃告发京华城案，促使司法调查展开。
description.en: Initiated judicial investigation into the Core Pacific City case by filing a formal complaint with the Taipei District Prosecutors Office.

description.zh-cn: 在工程补助款案中，驳回检方上诉，使钟小平等人获判无罪定谳。
description.en: In the engineering subsidy case, the Supreme Court rejected the prosecutor's appeal, leading to the final acquittal of Chung Hsiao-ping and others.

description.zh-cn: 与时任立委邱毅共同召开记者会，质疑高雄银行协助高雄市长陈菊渎职。
description.en: Held a joint press conference with then-Legislator Chiu Yi to question whether Bank of Kaohsiung was assisting Kaohsiung Mayor Chen Chu in malfeasance.

description.zh-cn: 质疑高雄市长陈菊利用其对高雄银行的影响力，涉嫌渎职炒高台北市房价。
description.en: Accused Kaohsiung Mayor Chen Chu of using her influence over the Bank of Kaohsiung for malfeasance to inflate Taipei's housing prices.

description.zh-cn: 质疑高雄银行协助高雄市长陈菊渎职。
description.en: Accused the Bank of Kaohsiung of assisting Kaohsiung Mayor Chen Chu in malfeasance.

description.zh-cn: 在2014年初告发连胜文在康师傅TDR案中涉嫌背信，但在同年4月国民党市长初选落败后表示将全力支持连胜文。
description.en: In early 2014, accused Sean Lien of breach of trust in the Tingyi TDR case, but after losing the KMT mayoral primary in April of the same year, he pledged his full support for Lien.

description.zh-cn: 因不满钟小平就康师傅TDR案的不实指控，对钟小平提出诽谤告诉。
description.en: Filed a defamation lawsuit against Chung Hsiao-ping due to dissatisfaction with his false accusations regarding the Tingyi TDR case.

description.zh-cn: 发动罢免时任立法委员林昶佐，该罢免案于2022年1月9日投票但未通过。
description.en: Initiated a recall campaign against then-Legislator Freddy Lim, which failed to pass in a vote on January 9, 2022.

relationships.target: 2022年台北市第五选举区立法委员林昶佐罢免案

description.zh-cn: 作为主要发起人，推动对立法委员林昶佐的罢免案。
description.en: As a main initiator, he promoted the recall case against Legislator Freddy Lim.

description.zh-cn: 与民进党籍的陈文治一同被控在担任台北县议员期间诈领工程补助款，后经最高法院判决无罪定谳。
description.en: Was accused along with DPP member Chen Wen-chih of fraudulently obtaining engineering subsidies while serving as a Taipei County Councilor; both were later acquitted by the Supreme Court.
